info.task: navigate forwards to a switch in the on state
info.title: Navigate forwards to a switch in the on state in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusBeforeAndTurnOnSwitch
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link before the switch, and sets the state of the switch to 'on'

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Notifications' switch.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Notifications' switch.
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn on the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.
